text: is a Japanese science fiction novel series written by Issui Ogawa and illustrated by Range Murata. Four novels were published under Kadokawa's Kadokawa Haruki imprint between January 2002 and November 2003. An anime adaptation has been announced for fall 2018. ==Volumes== ==References== ==External links== * Category:2002 Japanese novels Category:Japanese science fiction novels Category:Science fiction anime and manga Category:2002 science fiction novels
title: Star of Guidance
